Kayaking Decals  All Paddling Decals are only $4.95 and shipping is free! Great exterior vinyl decals with premium UV resistant pigmented ink. White backed decals can be used on any surface, not just for windows. An additional UV overlayment sheet gives these decals an expected outdoor life of 3 to 5 years.
